name: Elves' Eve
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare Game Jam.

Every Christmas Eve, when the elves have their leave,
they get up to no good, in every neighbourhood.
They sneak into a house, through the deep snow.
They line up and prepare their aim,
as they have only one throw.

Controls:

- A/D or Left/Right to Walk
- W/S or Up Arrow/Down Arrow for throwing angle
- Space bar to prepare for throw
- Space bar to throw
- R to reset
- P to pause
- M to Mute
- Enter to fast forward
